name: star (T-3000)
description:
EDIT: for bams pilots: try first bams12 version: it is much less glitched under lower speeds - but it is still not that smooth i want the game to be.

This is a pre-alpha prototype of a space shooting game like BSGO was. Currently it is single player. Soon in a week or so game will be much better than it is today. Game lack many important things - it is prototype so u can just check flight controls - nothing else. Most important thing is that this is pre-pre alpha version of the game....

For controls(turn or strafe) use numeric buttons: 7,4-up/down, 8,5-left,right,9,6- roll left,right, enter- forward. Use S to stop enemy. Use L to change enemy hps to 1000.
